item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @i_noob_iii i noob iii
item.description:
@i_noob_iii wrote:

put it under case 155:

case 155: // first Click npc
            int NPCSlot = (misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize) / 1000);
            int NPCID = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].npcType;

            faceNPC(NPCSlot);
            boolean FishingGo = false;
            boolean PutNPCCoords = false;

this is for the first click of an NPC AKA “Talk”

Case 17: is for Second click of an NPC AKA “Trade”

goodluck

Read full topic

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @Hunter_74 Hunter_74
item.description:
@Hunter_74 wrote:

I think i just did it?

I put the NPC into auto-spawn.
Went into Shops, made it, ID: 44
Then went to client.java

Heres the example under case 17.

} else if (NPCID == 536) {
// Valaine
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 36; // Champion’s guild shop
} else if (NPCID == 933) {
// Legend’s Shop
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 37; // Legend’s Shop
} else if (NPCID == 932) {
// Legends General Store
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 38; // Legend’s Gen. Store

These are just some of them.
Now heres mine right underneath

} else if (NPCID == 536) {
			// Valaine
			PutNPCCoords = true;
			WanneShop = 36; // Champion's guild shop
		} else if (NPCID == 933) {
			// Legend's Shop
			PutNPCCoords = true;
			WanneShop = 37; // Legend's Shop
		} else if (NPCID == 932) {
			// Legends General Store
			PutNPCCoords = true;
			WanneShop = 38; // Legend's Gen. Store
		} else if (NPCID == 804) {
			PutNPCCoords = true;
			WanneShop = 25; // Crafting shop
                    } else if (NPCID == 455) {
			// Wydin
			PutNPCCoords = true;
			WanneShop = 44; // Herblore Shop

I compiled, and no errors.
But the shop doesn’t trade.

Read full topic

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @i_noob_iii i noob iii
item.description:
@i_noob_iii wrote:

[quote=“Hunter_74, post:1, topic:315735”]I added a New NPC,
ID: 455
I want it to be able to sell items,
But i don’t know how to add items to it, and all.[/quote]

Okay, go to your server files find this file: shops.CFG
there should be a bunch of lines there like this

shop = 1	blabla		1	1	2595	100	2591	100	2593	100	2597	
shop = 2	abc				1	1	2595	100	2591	100	2593	100	2597	
shop = 3	qwerty		1	1	4511	10	4509	10
shop = 1

is the ID of the shop,

abc

is the name of the shop change that to the name u want ur shop to have

 1	1

i kinda forgot what that stands for just leave it like that

2595	100	2591	100

ok thats, Item ID Amount Item ID Amount
use TAB not space,

ok go to the bottem of that file, then add a new line just above [ENDOFSHOPLIST]

shop = 3	qwerty		1	1	ITEMID	AMOUNT

ok change “3” to a number that isnt used yet, so look at the line above it if thats like 50 make ur line shop = 51

ok thats it for SHOPS.CFG

Now lets go to client.java
search

 case 17:

u will see something like case 17: // second Click npc NPCSlot = ((misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize) / 1000) - 128); NPCID = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].npcType; faceNPC(NPCSlot); FishingGo = false; PutNPCCoords = false;

under that put this

             else if (NPCID == IDofurshopguy) { 
                PutNPCCoords = true;
                WanneShop = ID of the shop in SHOPS.CFG;
}

hope this helps you.

goodluck

Read full topic
